channel.title: How do you get your comp to display other languages like jap?
channel.description: well i was going to an asian site and i all i saw was [] [] [] and ??? how do i get it to display russian,slovak,jap, ect.?

item.title: How do you get your comp to display other languages like jap?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Your windows xp should come pre-installed with Russian, Arabic and some other language sets installed. You should only need to install east-Asia language sets.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get your comp to display other languages like jap?

item.title: How do you get your comp to display other languages like jap?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Assuming you’re using WinXP, go to Control Panel, click on Regional and Language Options, go to the Languages tab and select “Install files for East Asian languages” or something. I don’t know about including russian or anything, but this should enable support for most oriental languages.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you get your comp to display other languages like jap?
